statements: SELECT * FROM customer_reviews;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM customer_reviews ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT customer_id, review_text FROM customer_reviews WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM customer_reviews;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(review_id) AS total_reviews FROM customer_reviews GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(review_id) AS total_reviews FROM customer_reviews GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_reviews > 1;
SELECT review_id, review_text, rating FROM customer_reviews WHERE review_date >= '2021-01-01' AND review_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM customer_reviews GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM customer_reviews WHERE rating < 3;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT name, email FROM customers
SELECT customer_id, address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews WHERE rating > 3
SELECT review_text, rating FROM customer_reviews ORDER BY rating
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, address FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY review_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(review_id) AS review_count FROM customer_reviews GROUP BY customer_id HAVING review_count > 2;
SELECT * FROM main_database ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, service_rating FROM main_database WHERE service_rating > 3;
SELECT customer_name, service_rating FROM main_database WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM main_database;
SELECT customer_name, service_rating FROM main_database WHERE id = 1;
SELECT review_text, review_date FROM customer_reviews JOIN main_database ON customer_reviews.customer_id = main_database.id;

SELECT customer_name, review_text, feedback_text FROM main_database JOIN customer_reviews ON main_database.id = customer_reviews.customer_id JOIN feedback ON customer_reviews.review_id = feedback.review_id;

SELECT customer_name, service_rating, review_text, feedback_text FROM main_database JOIN customer_reviews ON main_database.id = customer_reviews.customer_id JOIN feedback ON customer_reviews.review_id = feedback.review_id WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_price > 50.00;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, review_rating FROM customers c JOIN reviews r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id JOIN products p ON r.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC, customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 100;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 50 ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, review_text, review_rating FROM customers INNER JOIN reviews ON customers.customer_id = reviews.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, feedback_text FROM customers INNER JOIN feedback ON customers.customer_id = feedback.customer_id WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, rating FROM customer_reviews ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM customer_reviews WHERE review_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100.00;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM customer_reviews ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, review_text FROM customers JOIN customer_reviews ON customers.customer_id = customer_reviews.customer_id;
